com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources

Packages that use com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources
Package
Description
com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.client.okhttp
Implementation of client-side shape tree validation using the OkHttp HTTP client for Java.
com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.comparators
 
com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.contentloaders

com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.validation
 
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources used by com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.client.okhttp
    Class
    Description
    DocumentResponse
     
    InstanceResource
    InstanceResource is a base class which may represent either a ManageableResource (a resource that can be managed by a shape tree), or a ManagerResource (a resource which assigns shape trees to a ManageableResource).
    ManageableInstance
    A ManageableInstance represents a pairing of a shape tree ManagerResource and a ManageableResource.
    RelationAttributes
    Extension of ResourceAttributes used specifically for storage of Link Relation attribute maps
    ResourceAccessor
    Interface used by the shape trees core for accessing individual InstanceResources.
    ResourceAttributes
    The HttpClientHeaders object is a multi-map with some constructors and put-ers tailored to the shapetrees-java libraries.

    Class
    Description
    ManageableInstance
    A ManageableInstance represents a pairing of a shape tree ManagerResource and a ManageableResource.

  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources used by com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.helpers
    Class
    Description
    DocumentResponse
     
    InstanceResource
    InstanceResource is a base class which may represent either a ManageableResource (a resource that can be managed by a shape tree), or a ManagerResource (a resource which assigns shape trees to a ManageableResource).
    ManagerResource
    A ManagerResource represents a resource that is associated with a regular MangeableResource, and contains metadata in the form of a ShapeTreeManager that assigns one or more shape trees to the associated ManageableResource.
    RelationAttributes
    Extension of ResourceAttributes used specifically for storage of Link Relation attribute maps
    ResourceAttributes
    The HttpClientHeaders object is a multi-map with some constructors and put-ers tailored to the shapetrees-java libraries.
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources used by com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources
    Class
    Description
    DocumentResponse
     
    InstanceResource
    InstanceResource is a base class which may represent either a ManageableResource (a resource that can be managed by a shape tree), or a ManagerResource (a resource which assigns shape trees to a ManageableResource).
    ManageableInstance
    A ManageableInstance represents a pairing of a shape tree ManagerResource and a ManageableResource.
    ManageableResource
    A ManageableResource represents a regular resource that could be managed by one or more shape trees.
    ManagerResource
    A ManagerResource represents a resource that is associated with a regular MangeableResource, and contains metadata in the form of a ShapeTreeManager that assigns one or more shape trees to the associated ManageableResource.
    MissingManageableResource
    A MissingManageableResource represents a state where a given ManageableResource at a URL does not exist.
    RelationAttributes
    Extension of ResourceAttributes used specifically for storage of Link Relation attribute maps
    ResourceAccessor
    Interface used by the shape trees core for accessing individual InstanceResources.
    ResourceAttributes
    The HttpClientHeaders object is a multi-map with some constructors and put-ers tailored to the shapetrees-java libraries.
  • Classes in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources used by com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.validation
    Class
    Description
    ManageableInstance
    A ManageableInstance represents a pairing of a shape tree ManagerResource and a ManageableResource.
    ManageableResource
    A ManageableResource represents a regular resource that could be managed by one or more shape trees.
    ResourceAccessor
    Interface used by the shape trees core for accessing individual InstanceResources.
    ResourceAttributes
    The HttpClientHeaders object is a multi-map with some constructors and put-ers tailored to the shapetrees-java libraries.
